basic.description: A detailed study of representative Québécois authors since 1965. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le roman québécois

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN335 or FREN435
